4 Petarung UFC dengan Bayaran Terbesar
05 Nov 2019, 15:04 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Khabib Nurmagomedov menjadi petarung dengan bayaran terbesar di UFC. (AP Photo/ Mahmoud Khaled)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Juara dunia kelas ringan Khabib Nurmagomedov masih menjadi petarung UFC dengan bayaran terbesar mengalahkan nama tenar seperti Conor McGregor dan Nate Diaz.Khabib menjadi petarung UFC dengan bayaran terbesar berkat pertarungan melawan Dustin Poirier, September 2019. Dikutip dari Republic World, berikut empat petarung UFC dengan bayaran terbesar:1. Khabib Nurmagomedov (Rusia) / US$6 juta (setara Rp84 miliar)Khabib mendapat bayaran US$6 juta saat melawan Poirier. Ketika itu Khabib menang KO atas Poirier di ronde ketiga pada UFC 242. Khabib sukses mempertahankan gelar juara dunia kelas ringan UFC di pertarungan tersebut.


Khabib Nurmagomedov mendapat bayaran US$6 juta di UFC. (Michael Reaves/Getty Images /AFP)

Bayaran yang didapat Khabib dari pertarungan melawan Poirier membuat The Eagle hingga kini masih menjadi pertarung dengan bayaran terbesar.2. Conor McGregor (Republik Irlandia) / US$3 juta (setara Rp42 miliar)


Conor McGregor mendapat bayaran lebih besar dari luar UFC. (Jared Wickerham/Getty Images/AFP)

McGregor ada di posisi kedua setelah mendapat bayaran US$3 juta saat menghadapi Khabib, 6 Oktober 2018. Meski McGregor berstatus sebagai penantang saat melawan Khabib di UFC 229, McGregor justru mendapat bayaran US$1 juta lebih banyak daripada Khabib. McGregor kalah di ronde keempat dari Khabib.Menariknya, McGregor saat ini masih tercatat sebagai petarung mixed martial art (MMA) dengan bayaran terbesar berkat pertarungan tinju melawan Floyd Mayweather Jr. pada Agustus 2017. McGregor dibayar US$85 juta saat melawan Mayweather.3. Nate Diaz (Amerika Serikat) / US$2 juta (setara Rp28 miliar)


Nate Diaz mendapat bayaran terbesar saat melawan Conor McGregor. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II)

Diaz memang hanya mendapat bayaran US$500.000 saat melawan Jorge Masvidal, akhir pekan lalu. Namun, Diaz pernah mendapat bayaran US$2 juta dari pertarungan kedua melawan McGregor pada Agustus 2016.4. Jon Jones (Amerika Serikat) / US$500.000 (setara Rp7 miliar)


Jon Jones merupakan juara bertahan kelas berat-ringan UFC. (Sean M. Haffey/Getty Images/AFP)

Juara bertahan kelas berat-ringan UFC Jon Jones mendapatkan bayaran US$500.000 ketika melawan Thiago Santos pada Juli 2019. Sebelumnya, jumlah bayaran Jones di UFC tidak terlalu jauh dari kisaran US$500.000. (har/ptr)

4 UFC fighters with the biggest pay
05 Nov 2019, 15:04 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Khabib Nurmagomedov became the biggest paid fighter in the UFC. (AP Photo / Mahmoud Khaled)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Lightweight world champion Khabib Nurmagomedov is still the biggest-paid UFC fighter to beat famous names like Conor McGregor and Nate Diaz. The following are the four biggest-paid UFC fighters: 1. Khabib Nurmagomedov (Russia) / US $ 6 million (equivalent to Rp84 billion) Khabib was paid US $ 6 million when fighting Poirier. At that time Khabib won a knockout over Poirier in the third round at UFC 242. Khabib successfully defended the UFC lightweight world title in the fight.


Khabib Nurmagomedov got paid US $ 6 million at the UFC. (Michael Reaves / Getty Images / AFP)

The payment that Khabib got from the fight against Poirier made The Eagle still remains the biggest-paid battle.2. Conor McGregor (Republic of Ireland) / US $ 3 million (equivalent to Rp.42 billion)


Conor McGregor gets paid more than outside the UFC. (Jared Wickerham / Getty Images / AFP)

McGregor is in second place after getting paid US $ 3 million when facing Khabib, October 6, 2018. Although McGregor was a challenger when fighting against Khabib at UFC 229, McGregor actually paid US $ 1 million more than Khabib. McGregor lost in the fourth round to Khabib. Interestingly, McGregor is currently still listed as a mixed martial art (MMA) fighter with the biggest pay thanks to a boxing battle against Floyd Mayweather Jr. in August 2017. McGregor was paid US $ 85 million against Mayweather. Nate Diaz (United States) / US $ 2 million (equivalent to Rp.28 billion)


Nate Diaz gets the biggest payment against Conor McGregor. (AP Photo / Frank Franklin II)

Diaz did only get paid US $ 500,000 against Jorge Masvidal, last weekend. However, Diaz once got paid US $ 2 million from the second fight against McGregor in August 2016.4. Jon Jones (United States) / US $ 500,000 (equivalent to Rp7 billion)


Jon Jones is the defending champion of the UFC light-heavyweight class. (Sean M. Haffey / Getty Images / AFP)

UFC heavyweight defending champion Jon Jones gets US $ 500,000 in payment against Thiago Santos in July 2019. Previously, Jones's payment at UFC was not too far from the range of US $ 500,000. (har / ptr)
